about_the_game:
Game Introduction

  • Game Background

Players take on the role of survivors of a tribe that has fled to another planet, where it seems that the civilization of this world has long been extinct. In this unknown world, there appear to be other unknown creatures besides your tribe. You will embark on a unique adventure in this savage, dangerous world filled with monstrous creatures, exploring the unknown, challenging various strange monsters, constantly collecting all kinds of rare treasures, continuously unlocking your own genetic forms, gaining different skills and talents, and defeating strong enemies. Survival, strengthening, adventure, and exploration are the only ways to uncover the mysteries of this world and find the only path to defeat the monsters.

  • Game Features

Rich construction, with a variety of combinations and collocations including weapons, physical techniques, magic, dragon might, and props, allowing for stylish mowing down of enemies.

Genetic unlocking allows for changes in form and talent, with rich variations in character appearance and style.

Challenge mode, where you can challenge monster bosses with distinct combat styles, build your own strategic construction, and write the fastest legend.

  • GamePlay

The game's main thread revolves around continuously challenging and exploring the strange world, using combat skills to defeat monsters of various forms.

Constantly stimulate the evolution of new genes and bloodlines, mastering new combat skills, talents, and forms.

Work with props and skills in the store to form a powerful combat strategy construction, mowing down enemies in style.

In challenge mode, you can challenge the Cthulhu bosses with distinct characteristics in different terrain environments such as plains, deserts, forests, and ports.

short_description: "Happy Monster" is a rogue like game themed around dragons and Cthulhu monsters. Players control a small monster, fighting through an alien world filled with monsters. Survive, grow stronger, and explore to unlock new forms, gain power, and uncover ways to defeat the monsters.
